title: Lag?
body: Has anyone else been experiencing insane lag recently. My ping is usually 30-40 but ever since last week my ping has been jumping from anywhere between 150-1600 and I know it's not my internet because I haven't changed service or providers. So I was wondering if anyone know why it was happening.

replies.body: The problem is most likely your internet. You should call your ISP and see if they are having issues or if you need to replace your router.

There's a pretty good chance that your ISP is having some issues if this just started happening randomly. Go ahead and grab the network logs from one of those games and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Paste a screenshot of what it gives you here so I can take a look!
Nice folder name ya got there, but I won't be able to see images that are only saved on your pc. Upload it to something like Gyazo or Imgur and send me that link ^_^

Sorry I was falling asleep when I replied at the time it made alot more sense.
https://imgur.com/jSfZ82V

Yeouch that's a good bit of packet loss there. That's most likely the source of the ping spikes you've had, and unfortunately packet loss is typically caused by the route that your ISP is directing your connection. I'd suggest reaching out to them with this data as well as a traceroute if possible to let them know something might not be working as intended.
its is been laggy this week lately
